name: Offroad 4x4 Car Driving 2021
description:
This off-road 4x4 game contains awesome suv and jeep cars is an outstanding environment muddy forest and desert. Car driving and racing games through mud, snow in a extreme offroad outlaw conditions 2022.
Drive alone in offline mode or just drive among others drivers in online multiplayer mode. Also you can create awesome maps to play with your friends online.
This off-road multiplayer jeep car game has 4x4 SUV cars. These cars are petrol and diesel ones. The torque of this cars will help you to climb the rocks, to pass through the mud and jump over the hills.

Control the powerful vehicles in over 30 realistic trials driving missions simulator. Each one of them is unique and can prove its performance on every terrain and track. Get behind the wheel of safari trucks , army 4x4, monster trucks, race buggies and modern SUV’s, each with unique sounds and ultra-realistic suspension behavior. Go around heaps of stones, force water obstacles, climb up steep slopes and go down treacherous hills.
If you are ready to drive outlaw in wild forest or desert, download this off-road game today. American jeeps v8.

Game features:
- Outstanding graphics
- Over 15 offroad cars (we add new cars)
- Online and offline mode ( multiplayer )
- Jeep customization
- brake, transmission 4x4, torque and steering power tuning system.
- Mud forest with a river.
- Desert
- Create your own map
- US cars
- Rock crawler
- Free to play
